title: A Dog's Breakfast David Hewlett)
description:
Patrick (David Hewlett who plays Dr. Rodney McKay on Stargate Atlantis) is an oddball loner, who is a bit psychotic and when his sister, Marilyn(played by David's real life sister Kate Hewlett who also played Rodney's sister, Jeannie, on Stargate Atlantis)brings home her actor boyfriend, Ryan(Paul McGillion who plays Dr. Carson Beckett from Stargate Atlantis), Patrick is overwhelmed with a homicidal rage when he thinks that the boyfriend is out to kill his sister.  Well the battle is on, Patrick was going to kill this cheating usurper if it's the last thing he does!  However, Ryan is proving exceedingly hard to kill and Patrick's dog, Mars, proves to be no help at all!  

David Hewlett, with his wife Jane Loughman and John Lenic,  wrote, produced, directed and acted in this dark comedy with all the panache he could beg, steal or borrow .  Absolutely, hysterically brilliant, a must-see movie for everyone!

Christopher Judge (Teal'c from Stargate SG-1) and Rachel Luttrell (Teyla Emmagen from Stargate Atlantis) also guest star.
